content.raw: Just wondering how the two might interact. Perhaps, if the shot has defined the interval, that will override what's in the BLACS GUI, which will grey out the box and say 'set by experiment script' or something in a tooltip. Possibly overridable still if you really want. And if subsequent shots don't define the inteval it will revert back to whatever was previously set in the BLACS GUI.
content.html: Just wondering how the two might interact. Perhaps, if the shot has defined the interval, that will override what's in the BLACS GUI, which will grey out the box and say 'set by experiment script' or something in a tooltip. Possibly overridable still if you really want. And if subsequent shots don't define the inteval it will revert back to whatever was previously set in the BLACS GUI.
